content: infuse your space with a fresh burst of nature by displaying these delightful crochet planter pods that are quick and easy to create stitching in bernat maker home decrease pattern is worked in the round in one piece using single_crochet and half_double_crochet techniques perfect to hold potted plants all around your house explore a selection of shades to add interest and color to any room pattern includes a small and large size to complete a decorative set small version approx 4½ 11 5 cm diameter to fit 4 10 cm plant pot large version approx 7 18 cm diameter to fit 6 15 cm plant pot
